      • onNetworkSelected

        public void onNetworkSelected(java.lang.String bssid,
                              java.lang.String ssid)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkSelectionDialogFragment.NetworkSelectionDialogListener
        Which network the user decided to connect to WARNING: Do NOT try to simplify this and just pass in the BSSID. I did and Android freaked out trying to set a WifiConfiguration object to have a BSSID and no SSID. I ended up getting a network configuration with no SSID or BSSID with a high priority and had to clear it in code Just don't do it.
        Specified by:
        onNetworkSelected in interface NetworkSelectionDialogFragment.NetworkSelectionDialogListener
        Parameters:
        bssid - the network BSSID
        ssid - the network SSID
